      • getDefaultOptions

        public static int getDefaultOptions()
        Get the default options mask used when no options are provided upon message creation
        Returns:
        Default message options mask.

      • getPriority

        public static int getPriority()
        Gets the default message priority set by the user. If no default was set, returns CNMessage.PRIORITY_3
        Returns:
        Default priority option.

      • setPriority

        public static void setPriority(int priority)
        Sets the default priority value to be used if no message options are provided when sending a message.
        Parameters:
        priority - Priority option defined in CNMessage

      • getForwardRestricted

        public static int getForwardRestricted()
        Gets the default forward restriction option set by the user. Defaults to CNMessage.FORWARD_UNRESTRICTED.
        Returns:
        Default restriction option.

      • setForwardRestricted

        public static void setForwardRestricted(int restricted)
        Sets the default forward restriction value to be used if no message options are provided when sending a message.
        Parameters:
        restricted - Forward restriction option defined in CNMessage

      • setReadAcknowledgement

        public static void setReadAcknowledgement(int acknowledgement)
        Sets the default read acknowledgement value to be used if no message options are provided when sending a message.
        Parameters:
        acknowledgement - Read acknowledgement option defined in CNMessage

      • getReadAcknowledgement

        public static int getReadAcknowledgement()
        Gets the default read acknowledgement option set by the user. Defaults to CNMessage.FORWARD_UNRESTRICTED.
        Returns:
        Default read acknowledgement option.

      • getExpiration

        public static int getExpiration()
        Gets the default expiration duration option set by the user, in minutes. Defaults to off.
        Returns:
        Default read acknowledgement option.

      • setExpiration

        public static void setExpiration(int expiration)
        Sets the default message expiration time, in minutes.
        Parameters:
        expiration - Expiration time in minutes
